entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 30.
